title: Different Kinds of Magic
description: Four novelettes that explore the magic1. "Except the Music", by Kristine Kathryn Rusch.2. The Parthenopean Scalpel", by Bruce Sterling.3. "The Astral Disruptor", by Rhys Hughes.4. "Benchwarmer", by Mike Resnick and Lezli Robyn.
author: Kristine Kathryn Rusch
